creator: arjen@pinguins.dyndns.org
text:
If Lenya 1.2RC2 is installed in a directory with spaces in the name
(such as c:\Program Files\Apache Group\Lenya) the autorisation system
will fail with an internal error.  This is probably due to
java.net.URI not being able to handle te space and nobody bothering
to escape it ??
